sentences.en: After TXLC treatment, the myocardial necrosis and cell apoptosis were markedly alleviated.
sentences.cn: 通心络干预后心肌细胞坏死及凋亡均显著减轻.

sentences.en: Areas of necrosis and cavitation may occur within the tumor.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤内可以有坏死和成腔区.

sentences.en: Calf diphtheria, is characterized by bilateral necrosis of the mucous membrane of the larynx.
sentences.cn: 犊白喉, 以喉粘膜的两侧性环死为特征.

sentences.en: CDFI did not show any flow signals in or around the necrosis.
sentences.cn: 彩超在病变周边及内部未探及任何彩色血流信号.

sentences.en: Confirmation can be obtained by detecting extensive necrosis through careful digital palpation.
sentences.cn: 通过仔细的手指触诊,能从检查出的广泛坏死而获得确诊.

sentences.en: Conversely, diffuse or multifocal necrosis is not characteristic of the intrinsic toxins.
sentences.cn: 相反, 扩散性或多病灶性坏死不是内毒素的特性.

sentences.en: Early necrosis or post haustorium formation necrosis of haustoria might take place.
sentences.cn: 吸器可以在发育早期受抑坏死,也可迟滞至吸器体形成之后坏死.

sentences.en: Gangrenous necrosis involves the tissues of a body part.
sentences.cn: 坏疽使机体局部组织坏死,炎症可以扩散到从趾到皮下软组织(肪、缔组织)骨.

sentences.en: Massive cortical necrosis can result in permanent anuria.
sentences.cn: 广泛的皮质坏死能造成永久性无尿.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the clinical therapy of acute retinal necrosis syndrome ( ARN ) through summary of 5 cases.
sentences.cn: 目的　通过5例病例总结,探讨手术治疗急性视网膜坏死综合征 ( acuteretinal necrosis,ARN ) 的临床效果.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the effective methods in treating acute retinal necrosis ( ARN ).
sentences.cn: 目的探讨急性视网膜坏死 ( acuteretinal necrosis,ARN ) 的有效治疗方法.

sentences.en: Of the 13 patients with liquefaction necrosis, 11 had malignant disease.
sentences.cn: 病变内部出现液化坏死13例, 其中恶性病变11例.

sentences.en: Results Fatty necrosis and lipoma and had their own sonographic characteristics.
sentences.cn: 结果归纳出了脂肪坏死及脂肪瘤的超声图像特征.

sentences.en: Results No hepatocyte necrosis was found in groups B and C.
sentences.cn: 结果:B、C组再灌注后均无肝细胞坏死.

sentences.en: The diseased fish's liver cells vacuslation , some liver cells necrosis.
sentences.cn: 病鱼肝细胞水样变性, 某些肝细胞坏死.

words.tran_cn: [病理] 坏死的；骨疽的，坏疽的

trans.tran_en: Necrosis is the death of part of someone's body, for example because it is not getting enough blood
